author: Sarah Perez
title: Spotify adds fundraising features and a COVID-19 news hub to address the health crisis
description: Spotify this morning announced a series of new initiatives to address the COVID-19 health crisis across its platform. The company is launching a financial relief effort for those in the creative community who have been heavily impacted by the virus, which inc…
